info.title: jobEQ API
info.description: jobEQ API documentation based on Swagger specification. To start using jobEQ API application should be registered by jobEQ and receive secret key, please email us to register your application. Application should perform authentication based on oAuth2 protocol. You can find detailed description of authentication procedure in this document.

tags.name: people
tags.description: set of functions related to personal data

post.summary: register new person in the CUG
post.description: register new person in jobEQ database, client must provide a CUG where to put the person record, profile will be added to default CUG inbox storageroom

parameters.name: cugID
parameters.description: ID of CUG to regester person at. Current API client should have enough access permissions to register people in requested CUG

201.description: new person record was created and added to the CUG

Location.description: URI to retrieve person record with API

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission

403.description: Person registration in provided CUG is not allowed

get.description: retrieve person pin code sha1 hash, this might be useful when doing person authentication. Note that HR user needs specific permissions to retrieve PIN

401.description: Unauthorized: access token is incorrect, API user is invalid

403.description: Forbidden: API user doesn't have access to personal data or not enough permissions to process request

404.description: Not Found: personID is invalid or person doesn't exist

get.summary: get absolute iWAM scores for person
get.description: retrieve iWAM scores for person. If person didn't complete iWAM, error will be returned. If person completed iWAM more then once, the latest test data would be returned. Note: one jobEQ credit will be charged in case if current API call is the first attempt to use personal iWAM data.

403.description: API user doesn't have access to requested person, or not enough permisions to process request

409.description: iWAM is not available for provided person

get.summary: get relative iWAM scores for person
get.description: retrieve iWAM scores for person relative to provided standard group. If person didn't complete iWAM, error will be returned. If person completed iWAM more then once, the latest test data would be returned. Note: one jobEQ credit will be charged in case if current API call is the first attempt to use personal iWAM data.

parameters.name: stdgrpID
parameters.description: standard group used to calculate personal iWAM scores

403.description: API user doesn't have access to requested person, or not enough permisions to process request

409.description: iWAM is not available for provided person

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: when iWAM was started, full date with seconds when person started iWAM quiestionnaire

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: when iWAM was started, full date with seconds when person finished iWAM quiestionnaire

204.description: iWAM data for person was added

403.description: API user doesn't have access to requested person, or not enough permisions to process request

404.description: person ID doesn't exist, or iWAM is not allowed for person

200.description: current iWAM status of the person

401.description: Unauthorized: access token is incorrect, API user is invalid

403.description: Forbidden: API user doesn't have access to personal data or not enough permissions to process request

get.description: retrieve information about CUGs and storagerooms where person is registered. This will return only those CUGs and storagerooms which are accessible to current HR user.

200.description: returns data about CUGs and storagerooms where person ID is stored. The result is array of StorageInfo objects. If one of the array members is an object with empty storagerooms array, it means that person is registered in the CUG, but removed from all storagerooms.

401.description: Unauthorized: access token is incorrect, API user is invalid

403.description: Forbidden: API user doesn't have access to personal data or not enough permissions to process request

404.description: Not Found: personID is invalid or person doesn't exist

get.description: retrieve texts (questions and endings) for iWAM survey for provided language. See available translations in language parameter specification.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: language of translation ((ISO 639-1), available translations are defined in acceptable values

404.description: Not Found: no translation exists for requested language

get.summary: get person score for iWAM model
get.description: retrieve personal score for iWAM model. To perform this operation current HR user should have access to modeling tools and to specific provided model. Note: one jobEQ credit will be charged in case if current API all is the first attempt to use personal iWAM data.

401.description: Unauthorized: access token is incorrect, API user is invalid

403.description: Forbidden: API user doesn't have access to personal data, or not enough permissions to process request, or API user does not have access to model, or API user doesn't have access to requested standard group

404.description: Not Found: personID is invalid or person doesn't exist, or modelID is invalid

get.summary: get iWAM management report for person
get.description: retrieve iWAM management report for person in PDF file format. HR user should have permission to use management report. The response is binary PDF file named iwam_management_report.pdf

parameters.name: sections
parameters.description: which sections to include in the report (0 means all sections)

parameters.name: s4BarsType
parameters.description: type of Bars in section 4 (only used if s4Type is "bars" )

200.description: PDF file containing iWAM Management report

403.description: HR user has no access to personal data, or HR user doesn't have permission to use management report.  See errr message for details

get.summary: get personal iWAM attitude sorter report for person
get.description: get iWAM attitude sorter report for person in JSON file format.

parameters.name: cugID
parameters.description: ID of the CUG, used to determine whether to show jobAdvice in report, if not provided, the jobAdvice will not be displayed

parameters.name: stdgrpID
parameters.description: standard group ID. If not provided, then system will pick standard group based on person work country

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: ISO language code, if not provided, then English will be used

401.description: Unauthorized: access token is incorrect, API user is invalid

403.description: Forbidden: API user doesn't have access to personal data or not enough permissions to process request

404.description: Not Found: personID is invalid or person doesn't exist

get.summary: get iWAM ranking report for person
get.description: get iWAM ranking report for person in HTML file format. The response is HTML file named iwam_ranking_report.html with CUG header and footer and report content

200.description: HTML file containing iWAM ranking report

403.description: HR user has no access to personal data

PersonPIN.title: pin
PersonPIN.description: sha1 hash of person pin code

iwamStatus.description: current personal iWAM status, possible values are: 'n' - iWAM is not available for person, 't' - iWAM was completed by person and no new iWAM data can be submitted, '<integer>' - iWAM was completed at least once and new iWAM can be submitted (the value of integer shows how many iWAMs are stored for person already)

yearsOfSchool.description: number of years the person has gone to school, starting from the age of 6 (after kindergaarden)

isSamecountry.description: whether person always worked in “work country”

countryOfOrigin.description: ISO  code for the country if the person hasn’t always lived in the work country, the country the person identifies with (e.g. because the person was born there)

extraInfo.description: array of extra data for person, some CUGs might require some extra data to register person in the system

iWAMPatternsScore.title: score for single iWAM pattern
iWAMPatternsScore.description: representation of the score for one pattern

iWAMScoresAbsolute.title: absolute scores for iWAM
iWAMScoresAbsolute.description: representation of absolute person scores for iWAM

iWAMScoresRelative.title: scores for iWAM relative to standard group
iWAMScoresRelative.description: representation of person scores for iWAM relative to standard group

iWAMModelScore.title: scores for iWAM model
iWAMModelScore.description: representatin person score for iWAM model

red.description: how many times person appeared in the red zone

green.description: how many times person appeared in the green zone

orange.description: how many times person appeared in the orange zone

grey.description: how many times person appeared in the grey zone

iWAMAttitudeSorterReportPatternData.title: iWAM Attitude sorter report pattern data
iWAMAttitudeSorterReportPatternData.description: representation one pattern information used in iWAM attitude sorter report

jobAdvice.description: job advice related to current pattern

iWAMAttitudeSorterReport.title: iWAM attitude sorter report
iWAMAttitudeSorterReport.description: representation of iWAM Attitude sorter report

testDate.description: Date when iWAM test was completed

validity.description: Number of questions where endings order was not changed

strengths.description: Array of strings representing strengths for person

development.description: Array of strings representing areas of development for person

IwamQuestionTranslation.title: single iWAM question translation
IwamQuestionTranslation.description: strings of iWAM question and endings for specified language

endings.description: array of endings for the question. Order is the same as it appears in iWAM survey on jobEQ web site

IwamAnswer.title: iWAM answer
IwamAnswer.description: the string of 5 digins representing answer on iWAM question (example 43125)

order.description: integer with 5 digits representing iWAM endings order, each digit corresponds to initial ending position. Example 53124 measns that initial ending 5 was placed on 1st position, ending 3 was placed onm 2nd position etc.

storageroomID.description: array of storagerooms linked to the CUG. Note that array might be empty.

ReportSettings.title: report settings
ReportSettings.description: a set of settings with common parameters for various jobEQ reports

cugID.description: the ID of CUG to be used for charging and branding, if not provided and report is generated for person, then the first commercial CUG with person registration will be used

standardGroupID.description: the ID of standard group used to retrieve relative scores, if not provided standard group will be picked according to person work country

jobeqAPIAuth.description: Valid acceess token should be provided with every API request
